item.title: Request Response Messaging Pattern With MassTransit
item.description: When building distributed systems with .NET, direct calls between services can create tight coupling. The request-response messaging pattern can allow distributed services to communicate in a loosely coupled way. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/request-response-messaging-pattern-with-masstransit

item.title: Introduction to Distributed Tracing With OpenTelemetry in .NET
item.description: Distributed systems offer flexibility but introduce complexity, making troubleshooting a headache. Understanding how requests flow through your system is crucial for debugging and performance optimization. OpenTelemetry is an open-source observability framework that makes this possible. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/introduction-to-distributed-tracing-with-opentelemetry-in-dotnet
